description:
Built as a super-durable drysuit that you can comfortably wear all-day long, the Mustang Survival Helix Drysuit will be the piece of gear you never go paddling without. As a testament to the MarineSpec BP fabric's durability, the "BP" stands for "bomb proof." 4-layer waterproof-breathable material stands up well to abrasion, UV and salt-water. Getting in and out is easy thanks to zipper placement that allows you to finish zipping without needing to be an acrobat, and its strategic placement allows nature breaks without a second zipper.

  • Made of waterproof-breathable and durable MarineSpec™ BP fabric for excellent protection from the elements
  • Waterproof YKK® Aquaseal zipper doubles as entry and relief zipper
  • Internal suspenders balance suit weight for the best fit and comfort
  • Watertight zippered pockets on sleeve
  • Trimmable neoprene wrist cuffs for custom fit
  • Wrist overcuffs protect seals, and easily peel back for sleeve adjustment
  • Lightweight moulded knee pads stay put with adjustment tabs
  • Reinforced sock soles can handle extra wear
name: Mustang Survival Helix Dry Suit w/ Latex Gasket - Women's
